desc: We did a study and created a full coverage non woven cloth mask for everyday use that is comfortable, lightweight and breathable. Excellent for everyday use, disposable or recyclable. Family affordable, get 30 face masks for $12.95. Kids face masks, a 10 pack for $5. Available sanitizer, nitrile gloves, alcohol pads.

layout.text:
Masks are now very important to health not only in the USA, but worldwide. As the rest of the world catches up to US standards in vaccination rates, masks are importnat to have avilable in any situstion that may arise. AS COVID ebbs and flows throughout time and infections become reduced, it is always a good idea to have safe masks at the ready when they may be needed. Store them in a car, backpack, school or work. When there may be worry for infection our surgical type masks will be there to protect as they have always been since the beginning of this pandemic.
Our proprietary designed face mask is three layers of pure white non-woven fabric. No colored dye. 
Lightweight & breathable.
Full fashion fit contoured to the face.
Waterproof exterior, melt blown filtration, soft interior.
Cotton and elastin ear loops for extended wear comfort.
Extra long metal nose bar eliminates most fogging of glasses.
Family affordable and recyclable.
